function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of pragmatic guidance for mitigating health risks in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the relationship between buildings and occupant health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to affordable and adequate housing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of households to pay bills due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Amplified housing rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shifts in behavior towards pro-environmental approach are driven by threat and coping appraisal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic can push individuals towards environmental responsibility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemic speeding up progress towards social fairness and environment protection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effects of counter-pandemic measures on sustainable development goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor quality housing as a significant source of indoor pollutants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to prolonged time spent at home during lockdowns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management leading to potential virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate
